body.content:
My Dear Blessed  Gertrude  in the Lord Jesus,

Thanks for being concerned about my health and May the Good Lord Blesses
you as we do this project together in Jesus name Amen. I am writing you
this mail from my heart and I want you to know that i am very sorry about
what your ex did to you and your kids, but i appreciate the courage you
picked up to be the man and the father you suppose to be and be with your
kids, and that the good Lord has been there for you, i promise you he will
never leave you and turn his back on you. Amen. Before I contacted you, I
prayed and fasted to God almighty for him to Lead me to the rightful person
that will help me fulfill my last wishes on earth and I believe he has
directed me to you. I have been serving God before I developed this
sickness of Cancer, and I was asked to go back to my country for better
treatment. But it has not been easy for me to carry things as I planned
them due to my Health most especially now that this Cancer has spread all
over my body. I found it very difficult to accomplish my mission on earth
before I go back to meet my God in Heaven.

More so, have it in mind that i am alone in the hospital and there is no
fee for you to pay and ever since I Was brought back from Malaysia to my
home town here in United Kingdom, everybody That Claimed to be my well
wishers has departed from me simply because when they all heard the Cancer
has affected my whole body and my late husband relatives also denied me As
well because I was not able to bear any child for my late husband after the
death of our only child that is why I am finding it too hard to accomplish
my mission here on earth and I hope my trust and believing in you won't be
in vain.

My late husband's relatives are wishing me death because all they are
Concerned about is my late husband's wealth. They want me to die so that
they can Be able to claim all that my late husband left behind before He
died, Simply because I had no child for my late Husband and they Called me
all sort of names, Like (BARREN WOMEN), they even said that killed my
husband but only God can bear me witness because God knows I cannot kill. I
want you to claim this fund and use it to help the Poor and less privileged
in your country instead of my late husband. Relative to access to this fund
I would rather hand it over to you to take Care of the fund and also help
people who desire help. Because if This Fund get to my late husband's
relatives, they will misuse the fund. I am doing this because the doctor
told me that I would not live for long after my surgery, so I decided to
use this fund to help the poor.

I have received several messages from the ALLIANCE BANK OF MALAYSIA PLC for
me to send someone I can entrust My funds to, before my operation commence
and since everybody around me is just After my downfall and how they can
get my funds and use it for worldly purpose I have Decided to pray to God
Almighty for him to help me choose one of his faithfully servant To assist
me in fulfilling my last wishes. Please I really need your trust and mercy
because I am entrusting you with all my suffering and pains and it will be
a great pleasure if you can help me fulfill my wish to the very end. I
believe God almighty will see me through my operation which is coming up
next two week to enable me to see you person To person in the future and I
will be very glad if you keep me in prayers.


The Manager of the Bank has mailed me for a long time that I should look
for a relation which I trust with my heart to claim this fund Before the
Malaysia Government claim's it as an unclaimed fund. I don't have anybody
to call my relatives because my late husband Relative, whom I was supposed
to depend on, has turned their back on me, and this fund is in fixed
deposit. I don't want the government to claim this fund. That is Why I want
to use this fund to help the less privileged. Below are my bank details
which I want you to use to contact my bank after finishing reading my mail.




**BANK NAME: ALLIANCE BANK OF MALAYSIA PLC*CONTACT PERSON: MR.JEFF THAM KOK
KUEN*POSITION: HEAD,GROUP CORPORATE,COMMERCIAL & TRANSACTIONS*CONTACT:
jeffthan888@yandex.com <Jefftl1ham@outlook.com>*

Kindly Keep this transaction very private and confidential and make sure
that you deal Directly with Mr.Jeff Tham Kok Kuen, because he is the Bank
manager and only through him you get my fund transferred to you without any
Mistake. For your clear confirmation, I have enclosed here a scanned copy
of my Pictures in the Hospital. The Purpose of enclosing the picture was to
enable you to forward it across to the Bank where the Fund is deposited and
they will tell you what to do next and I want you to give me an update on
what they told you to do.

Lastly, below are my full Account details. I would like you to forward them
to the Bank  And Let them know that I have instructed you to claim my fund
and let them know you Are giving them the details for Verification.










**Name of the Bank: ALLIANCE BANK OF MALAYSIA PLC.*Depositor's Name: Mrs.
Margaret Bennett.*Account Name: Mrs. Margaret Bennett.*Account Number:
00209878777*Batch Number: 66840090040*Year Deposited: 2008*Secret question:
What is my husband's Last Name?*Answer: Bennett*Security Code:
90600040020*Currency: Great Britain Pounds.*
**Amount: (£5,000,000.00 GP)*

Hope my trust and belief in you won’t be in vain because I wouldn't Want to
be cheated at the same time while I go through pain in the Hospital. And I
hopefully believe if I survive my surgery, I would like to come over to
your country to see your humble work for the Lord.

Please keep praying for me and keep me posted on any information you get
from The Bank. I will like you to give me your telephone number and contact
address in your next E-mail to enable telephone conversation with you and
the Management of the Bank where I deposited my fund, So that I can let
them know that you are my relative and I would like the fund to be
Transferred to you without any further delay since I am sick and have Short
time to spend on earth as I cannot continue this transaction That is why I
have appointed you to help me out to fulfill my wish.

Kindly give me your full contact details as follows so That I can give it
to Mr.Jeff Tham Kok Kuen to enable telephone Conversation with you and him
as I cannot speak with you on the phone Reason because the sickness also
affected my brain and made me deaf:-





**(1) Your Full name.*(2) Your Contact Address.*(3) Your telephone
number    .*(4) Your fax number.*(5) Your Occupation*.

Because only Mr.Jeff Tham Kok Kuen can call you due to my health.  It is
really getting out of hand more than I can say. I just keep on praying to
God upon my condition on a sick bed. But please I want you to contact Mr.Jeff
Tham Kok Kuen, He is the  Head, Group Corporate, Commercial & Transactions
Of THE ALLIANCE BANK OF MALAYSIA PLC, if you want to know more about this
Transaction. So that He will tell you how the money can be transferred to
you without any delay.


I hope to read from you again in good faith. Remain blessed in God. Love
and Peace of the Lord be with you, now and forever. Amen.

Warmest Regards,

Mrs. Margaret Bennett

header.subject: Thanks for being concerned about my health
